website_summaries.verdict: While pricey, this club is a good 3 iron replacement for both left and right-handed players.
pros: Club features a HiBore crown and a Miyazaki C. Kua shaft
Plays well out of the rough or on the fairway
Comes in a variety of lofts, and has versions for left or right-handed players
Has a heavy clubhead for better launch and stability
cons: Compared to other options, this runs on the expensive side, particularly for a single club

customer_reviews.title: A smooth launching hybrid!!
customer_reviews.text: While I have historically had trouble hitting hybrids, this one hits it high and straight with admirable distance!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Clemente

customer_reviews.title: I Got Rid of my Five Iron
customer_reviews.text: This club replaced my five iron and completed my set of Cleveland hybrids - 3, 4 & 5. These hybrids have excellent clubheads and shafts and are much easier to hit than the corresponding irons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Just good off the tee for me
customer_reviews.text: I picked this club up hoping it would be as easy to hit as the HB Launcher Driver. For me it was the same as all the other hybrid's on the market, and not any more forgiving then the new Cobra hybrid which I had. I only use it on the long par 3's off the tee now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, forgiving, a go to hybrid
customer_reviews.text: This hybrid is my go to club. The 3 and the 5 bring consistency, accuracy and distance needed. Perfect compliment for those long par 5's. Believe the hype this is a go to club.
customer_reviews.author: Edward in Washington

customer_reviews.title: Different from the irons.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot hit woods. This is why I love my Cleveland HB Launcher irons. I can hit the # 4 club straight down the middle about 200 yards. I purchased the 3 hybrid thinking that it was a longer version of the same club. It is not. My experience is that it is just like any other hybrid, having more of a "wood" feel than iron. I cannot control it. This is the reason for my 3 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Another great Cleveland Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the club. Just what I was looking for in a hybrid. Would highly recommend Cleveland clubs.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: A great hybrid at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: The club arrived timely and was as advertised. I've played one round with it so far and the high launch trajectory is excellent. I'm a 70+ golfer who has had great difficulty carrying a shot 170 yards over traps and other hazards. So far, this club fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistently straight
customer_reviews.text: The 3 hybrid has quickly become one of the most reliable clubs in my bag. Great off the tee to find the fairways and I can also use it in heavy rough as it will easily get airborne. Very straight but I can shape it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Rescue me
customer_reviews.text: This is my faverite club in my bag. It gets me there when I need distance.
customer_reviews.author: Surenuff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Geat club out of the rough or the fairway, very straight hits.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Nice club
customer_reviews.text: I really like this club. The ball goes straight, even on bad hits. It has definitely helped improve my game.
customer_reviews.author: deejay

customer_reviews.title: Now have 3-5 hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Amazing club!! Everything I was hoping for. Just didn’t hit my 5 iron well. Making up for many missed hit shots. Wish I could get a 6 hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Buschell

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: The launcher works both in the fairway and rough. Excellent addition to my clubs
customer_reviews.author: BSedlak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great golf club! Delivery was quick and product was exactly as ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaine A. Kronser

customer_reviews.title: Good looking club
customer_reviews.text: Wrong club came don't who falt is was it could have been me sent back waiting for refunh
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lindsey jr

customer_reviews.title: New hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results from the first use. My go to club on the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Hybels

customer_reviews.title: didn't get head cover
customer_reviews.text: The head cover did not come with it. It says head cover included. please send head cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Game changing club!
customer_reviews.text: This club is a game changer. Easy to hit and forgiving. Ball flies long and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Hallett

customer_reviews.title: that it was in stock.
customer_reviews.text: nothing it is a great club. use more than any other club in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Al W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice option for the 160-180 yd shot...particularly to an elevated green. Comes in high and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to hit! Good replacement for a three iron.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Crawford

product_meta.title: Cleveland Golf Men's Launcher HB Hybrid
